name: claude-project-setup
description: Interactive CLI to set up Claude Code projects with professional development standards

scripts.build: if [ -d "src" ] && [ "$(ls -A src 2>/dev/null)" ]; then tsc; else echo "No TypeScript source files yet - skipping build"; fi
scripts.build:test: if [ -f "tsconfig.test.json" ]; then tsc -p tsconfig.test.json; else echo "No test TypeScript config - skipping test build"; fi
scripts.type-check: if [ -d "src" ] && [ "$(ls -A src 2>/dev/null)" ]; then tsc --noEmit; else echo "No TypeScript source files yet - skipping type check"; fi
scripts.type-check:test: if [ -f "tsconfig.test.json" ]; then tsc -p tsconfig.test.json --noEmit; else echo "No test TypeScript config - skipping test type check"; fi
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && NODE_ENV=test c8 node --test __tests__/**/*.js
scripts.update-docs: node -e "import('./dist/lib/readme-updater.js').then(m => m.updateAllDocs().then(r => console.log('Docs updated: README(' + r.readme.commandCount + ' commands), ESTIMATES(' + (r.estimates.updated ? 'updated' : 'no changes') + ')')))"
scripts.docs:update: npm run update-docs && echo 'Documentation updated successfully'

author: Claude Code Setup System
